title: Note- The travel distance to an exit from the dead end of a corridor shall not exceed half the distance specified above
clause_text: Note- The travel distance to an exit from the dead end of a corridor shall not exceed half the distance specified above. When more than one exit is required on a floor, the exits shall be as remote from each other as possible:
